verses.verse: Is there not a warfare to <S%H582>man<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>? And are not his <S%H3117>days<s%> like the <S%H3117>days<s%> of a <S%H7916>hireling<s%>?
As a <S%H5650>servant<s%> that earnestly <S%H7602>desireth<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow<s%>, And as a <S%H7916>hireling<s%> that <S%H6960>looketh<s%> for his <S%H6467>wages<s%>:
So am I made to <S%H5157>possess<s%> <S%H3391>months<s%> of <S%H7723>misery<s%>, And <S%H5999>wearisome<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> are appointed to <S%H4487>me<s%>.

When I lie <S%H7901>down<s%>, I <S%H559>say<s%>, When shall I <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and the <S%H6153>night<s%> be <S%H4059>gone<s%>? And I am <S%H7646>full<s%> of tossings to and <S%H5076>fro<s%> unto the dawning of the <S%H5399>day<s%>.
My <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H7415>worms<s%> and <S%H1487>clods<s%> of <S%H6083>dust<s%>; My <S%H5785>skin<s%> closeth <S%H7280>up<s%>, and breaketh out <S%H3988>afresh<s%>.
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than a <S%H708>weaver<s%>'s shuttle, And are <S%H3615>spent<s%> <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%>.
Oh <S%H2142>remember<s%> that my <S%H2416>life<s%> is a <S%H7307>breath<s%>: Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall no <S%H7725>more<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eye<s%> of him that <S%H7210>seeth<s%> me shall <S%H7789>behold<s%> me no <S%H5869>more<s%>; Thine eyes shall be upon me, but I shall not be.
As the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed<s%> and vanisheth <S%H3212>away<s%>, So he that goeth <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> shall come up no <S%H5927>more<s%>.
He shall <S%H7725>return<s%> no more to his <S%H1004>house<s%>, Neither shall his <S%H4725>place<s%> know him any <S%H5234>more<s%>.

Therefore I will not <S%H2820>refrain<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H6862>anguish<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>; I will <S%H7878>complain<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Am I a <S%H3220>sea<s%>, or a <S%H8577>sea-monster<s%>, That thou <S%H7760>settest<s%> a watch over <S%H4929>me<s%>?
When I <S%H559>say<s%>, My <S%H6210>bed<s%> shall <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H4904>me<s%>, My couch shall <S%H5375>ease<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint<s%>;
Then thou <S%H2865>scarest<s%> me with <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, And <S%H1204>terrifiest<s%> me through <S%H2384>visions<s%>:
So that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H977>chooseth<s%> <S%H4267>strangling<s%>, And <S%H4194>death<s%> rather than these my <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
I <S%H3988>loathe<s%> my <S%H2421>life<s%>; I would not live <S%H5769>alway<s%>: Let me <S%H2308>alone<s%>; for my <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.
What is <S%H582>man<s%>, that thou shouldest <S%H1431>magnify<s%> <S%H7896>him<s%>, And that thou shouldest set thy mind upon <S%H3820>him<s%>,
And that thou shouldest <S%H6485>visit<s%> him every <S%H1242>morning<s%>, And <S%H974>try<s%> him every <S%H7281>moment<s%>?
How <S%H4100>long<s%> wilt thou not look <S%H8159>away<s%> from <S%H7503>me<s%>, Nor let me alone till I swallow <S%H1104>down<s%> my <S%H7536>spittle<s%>?

If I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, what I unto <S%H5341>thee<s%>, O thou watcher of <S%H120>men<s%>? Why hast thou <S%H7760>set<s%> me as a <S%H4645>mark<s%> for <S%H4853>thee<s%>, So that I am a burden to myself?

And why dost thou not <S%H5375>pardon<s%> my <S%H6588>transgression<s%>, and take <S%H5674>away<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>? For now shall I lie <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>; And thou wilt seek me <S%H7836>diligently<s%>, but I shall not be.
